fields.Title: PLAZA / RENE TURNING BACK TIME
fields.Description: Ask René if he knows a way to turn back time

fields.Title: START
input
Untitled hub (02)
Endurance: "He doesn't know anything, he's too..."
fields.Dialogue Text: He doesn't know anything, he's too old. Doesn't have that *fire* in him anymore. But no worries, *we* will carry on. *Semper fidelis*, kingsman!

fields.Title: René Arnoux: "The old soldier nods. "Even after t..."
fields.Dialogue Text: The old soldier nods. "Even after the Revolution, after the Beachhead, there was a chance. Had we just stayed true to our *values*..."

fields.Title: René Arnoux: ""'This time'?!" He's becoming visib..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "'This time'?!" He's becoming visibly annoyed. "What happened to the first time? Did you make a mistake? Did you *fuck up*? Everyone did!"

fields.Title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""So... Is there anything else you w..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "So... Is there anything else you want from these gentlemen, or can we get back to it?"

fields.Title: René Arnoux: ""Alright, you got your laugh, ruine..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "Alright, you got your laugh, ruined my concentration and our game... Anything else you want, or can we start a new one?"
fields.Alternate1: "Alright, you got your laugh, ruined my concentration and our game... *again*. Anything else you want to ruin, or can we start a new one?"

fields.Title: You: ""No, I didn't mean it like that.""
fields.Dialogue Text: "No, I didn't mean it like that."

fields.Title: Variable["plaza.fascha_dq_asked_someone_the_q"]
Variable["plaza.fascha_dq_asked_someone_the_q"]
!(Variable["plaza.fascha_dq_asked_someone_the_q"])
Gaston Martin: ""Oh, you're in for a treat, officer..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "Oh, you're in for a treat, officer. Seeing the playful side of old René is about as rare as a red rainbow."

fields.Title: You: ""I'm not sure, to be honest. Just g..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "I'm not sure, to be honest. Just going with the flow."

fields.Title: René Arnoux: ""And there are no second chances. W..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "And there are no second chances. We don't deserve them! You can't just go back and restart -- that would make everything *MEANINGLESS*!" A shadow of pain comes over his face.

fields.Title: You: ""You know, it's not actually that b..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "You know, it's not actually that bad."

fields.Title: Empathy: "*Something* about this topic was ve..."
fields.Dialogue Text: *Something* about this topic was very personal to him, but the moment has passed.

fields.Title: You: "Regret about what?"
fields.Dialogue Text: Regret about what?

fields.Title: Variable["plaza.rene_fascha_regret_rc"]
Variable["plaza.rene_fascha_regret_rc"]
!(Variable["plaza.rene_fascha_regret_rc"])
You: "No, this is going too far. I should..."
fields.Dialogue Text: No, this is going too far. I should respect his privacy!

fields.Title: Empathy: "He thinks you're playing a joke on..."
fields.Dialogue Text: He thinks you're playing a joke on him.

fields.Title: Untitled hub
René Arnoux: ""Forensic techniques are your forte..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "Forensic techniques are your forte, not mine, officer." Something stiffens in the man. He shakes his head. "Find another fool, I will not be part of your... joke."

fields.Title: You: ""Him?""
fields.Dialogue Text: "Him?"

fields.Title: IsKimHere()
IsKimHere()
!(IsKimHere())
Jump to: [RENE MAIN HUB]
Composure: "His eyes seem to be pleading with y..."
fields.Dialogue Text: His eyes seem to be pleading with you.

fields.Title: You: "What is it?"
fields.Dialogue Text: What is it?

fields.Title: You: "Even thinking about it is invading..."
fields.Dialogue Text: Even thinking about it is invading his privacy. Better let it go.

fields.Title: Untitled hub (05)
René Arnoux: ""Where?!" His head drops between hi..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "Where?!" His head drops between his shoulders he snaps around with surprising speed.

fields.Title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""*Meaningless* is what I think this..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "*Meaningless* is what I think this line of questioning is. Call me a sceptic, but I don't think time travel is going to solve our murder case."

fields.Title: You: ""Look, I just want to turn back tim..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "Look, I just want to turn back time. Can either of you help me or not?"

fields.Title: You: ""Kim?""
fields.Dialogue Text: "Kim?"

fields.Title: You: ""War.""
fields.Dialogue Text: "War."

fields.Title: Savoir Faire: "Retired or not, there's still a tra..."
fields.Dialogue Text: Retired or not, there's still a trained killer in there.

fields.Title: You: ""Did I say that out loud?""
fields.Dialogue Text: "Did I say that out loud?"

fields.Title: Volition: "You know what you meant, but taking..."
fields.Dialogue Text: You know what you meant, but taking this kind of scolding does *not* feel good.

fields.Title: Variable["plaza.fascha_dq_asked_someone_the_q"]
Variable["plaza.fascha_dq_asked_someone_the_q"]
!(Variable["plaza.fascha_dq_asked_someone_the_q"])
Kim Kitsuragi: ""Yes." The lieutenant turns to look..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "Yes." The lieutenant turns to look at you as well. "What else, officer?"

fields.Title: Half Light: "You could *definitely* clear it wit..."
fields.Dialogue Text: You could *definitely* clear it with a flamethrower.

fields.Title: Rhetoric: "There's so much bitterness in his v..."
fields.Dialogue Text: There's so much bitterness in his voice it barely even registers as sarcasm.

fields.Title: You: "Just nod."
fields.Dialogue Text: Just nod.

fields.Title: Volition: "He would sooner die than let it sur..."
fields.Dialogue Text: He would sooner die than let it surface.

fields.Title: Jump to: [RENE MAIN HUB]
Pain Threshold: "No... not gun. Something repressed..."
fields.Dialogue Text: No... not gun. Something repressed and painful. Too late. The moment has passed.

fields.Title: René Arnoux: ""Anything else you want or can we g..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "Anything else you want or can we get back to our game?"

fields.Title: René Arnoux: ""It's always about love, isn't it?""
fields.Dialogue Text: "It's always about love, isn't it?"

fields.Title: You: ""It *is* an ugly world...""
fields.Dialogue Text: "It *is* an ugly world..."

fields.Title: Endurance: "The carabineer is too old and feebl..."
fields.Dialogue Text: The carabineer is too old and feeble to be useful. But you will carry on. *Movere tempore*, kingsman. For the tenacious no road is impassable.

fields.Title: René Arnoux: ""*Imbécile, un putain d'imbécile*....."
fields.Dialogue Text: "*Imbécile, un putain d'imbécile*..." The old veteran clutches his chest and tries to steady his breathing.

fields.Title: Volition: "Willed back into the darkest unexpl..."
fields.Dialogue Text: Willed back into the darkest unexplored depths of his mind -- never meant to be shared, seen or confronted.

fields.Title: René Arnoux: ""I thought you were a busy man, off..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "I thought you were a busy man, officer. Or at least you should be, so I won't comment on this... eccentricity. Now what?"

fields.Title: René Arnoux: ""*Bon sang*, son. You must have a l..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "*Bon sang*, son. You must have a loose screw up there or something." He taps on his temple. "Sounds like you really mean it."

fields.Title: René Arnoux: ""It happened slowly, like a seedlin..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "It happened slowly, like a seedling growing into a tree. Tiny incremental steps. Imperceptible till the thicket was so thick you couldn't clear it with a flamethrower..."

fields.Title: René Arnoux: ""The 'right track'? This *is* the r..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "The 'right track'? This *is* the right track! The only track." He gets visibly annoyed. "This is the world we shaped, a reflection of what we are: cowardly, ugly, and numb."

fields.Title: You: ""I'm not gonna say anything.""
fields.Dialogue Text: "I'm not gonna say anything."

fields.Title: René Arnoux: ""Enough yacking!" the carabineer cu..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "Enough yacking!" the carabineer cuts Gaston off mid-sentence. "We have a game to finish, so let's get back to it, unless there's something else?"

fields.Title: You: ""No, I literally need to go back in..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "No, I literally need to go back in time. For Revachol."
fields.Alternate1: "I'm not kidding. This is for Revachol. I need to return to the past."

fields.Title: René Arnoux: ""Goddamnit, son..." He turns back t..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "Goddamnit, son..." He turns back to you, frowning. "As an officer of the law you should know better than... damn it! Are we done here?"

fields.Title: René Arnoux: ""What the hell are we talking about..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "What the hell are we talking about here, officer?" He rubs the back of his head. "Look, we just want to play our game, so unless there's something else..."

fields.Title: Pain Threshold: "There's tenderness in the carabinee..."
fields.Dialogue Text: There's tenderness in the carabineer's look. Tenderness that's curdled into pain or something darker.

fields.Title: René Arnoux: ""Alright, I will entertain this......"
fields.Dialogue Text: "Alright, I will entertain this... *fantasy*, if you tell me, what interest does an RCM officer have in... 'time travel'?"

fields.Title: You: ""*Everyone* deserves a second chanc..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "*Everyone* deserves a second chance."

fields.Title: Pain Threshold: "Him."
fields.Dialogue Text: Him.

fields.Title: René Arnoux: ""W-war?" The word seems to derail h..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "W-war?" The word seems to derail his train of thought. "I mean yes. Yes... It changes men, changes lives and uh..."

fields.Title: Pain Threshold: "Shouldn't have brought him into thi..."
fields.Dialogue Text: Shouldn't have brought him into this. He doesn't know pain like you do.

fields.Title: Esprit de Corps: "Damn it, not this again..."
fields.Dialogue Text: Damn it, not this again...

fields.Title: Esprit de Corps: "What are you up to now?"
fields.Dialogue Text: What are you up to now?

fields.Title: René Arnoux: ""What?!" The old soldier scowls at..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "What?!" The old soldier scowls at you, unamused.

fields.Title: Encyclopedia: "Not actually *that* rare. It's just..."
fields.Dialogue Text: Not actually *that* rare. It's just that red, or monochrome, rainbows usually occur at sunrise or sunset, when blue and green wavelengths are scattered before reaching water droplets. Fewer eyes to see them then.

fields.Title: Kim Kitsuragi: "The lieutenant clears his throat. "..."
fields.Dialogue Text: The lieutenant clears his throat. "I think we're done here unless you have questions *not* relating to 'time travel' for the gentlemen?"

fields.Title: Empathy: "*Something* about this topic was ve..."
fields.Dialogue Text: *Something* about this topic was very personal to him, but the moment has passed.

fields.Title: Gaston Martin: ""But don't worry, I'm sure there's..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "But don't worry, I'm sure there's something else old René or I can assist you with."

fields.Title: René Arnoux: "You catch the old carabineer's gaze..."
fields.Dialogue Text: You catch the old carabineer's gaze slowly leaving his opponent's wrinkled face as his dark eyes meet yours -- whatever turmoil raged in him a moment ago is quelled for now.

fields.Title: You: ""Gun!""
fields.Dialogue Text: "Gun!"

fields.Title: Pain Threshold: "War isn't tied with regret for him...."
fields.Dialogue Text: War isn't tied with regret for him. Nevermind, the moment is gone.

fields.Title: René Arnoux: ""That's just *typical*!" The carabi..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "That's just *typical*!" The carabineer looks at you with disgust. "All you young guys these days. You want to be opinionated, controversial, opposition leaders..."

fields.Title: You: ""René... I need to go back in time...."
fields.Dialogue Text: "René... I need to go back in time. Can you help me?"

fields.Title: You: ""Men have lost their way. I want to..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "Men have lost their way. I want to guide them back. Like a beacon."

fields.Title: Untitled hub (04)
Gaston Martin: "A heavy silence falls over the crat..."
fields.Dialogue Text: A heavy silence falls over the crater. The man in the checkered suit doesn't know where to look or what to do with his hands. Finally he speaks:

fields.Title: Gaston Martin: ""Enough, officer," the other one sa..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "Enough, officer," the other one says with surprising resoluteness. "We can't help you. Not with this. Such an *emotional* topic..."

fields.Title: You: ""No, I need to go back to a time wh..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "No, I need to go back to a time when *love* was still possible."
fields.Alternate1: "I'm dead serious. Can you help me get back to the time when *love* was still possible?"

fields.Title: You: ""I *know* I can get history back on..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "I *know* I can get history back on the right track."

fields.Title: Variable["plaza.rene_facha_empathy_to_unlock_red"]
Variable["plaza.rene_facha_empathy_to_unlock_red"]
!(Variable["plaza.rene_facha_empathy_to_unlock_red"])
IsKimHere()
IsKimHere()
!(IsKimHere())
Empathy: "Only to break the silence."
fields.Dialogue Text: Only to break the silence.

fields.Title: You: ""Well, that depends on the flamethr..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "Well, that depends on the flamethrower..."

fields.Title: René Arnoux: ""It really does, doesn't it?" The o..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "It really does, doesn't it?" The old soldier produces a strange croaking sound -- with laughter-like qualities -- then quickly massages his chest. "But honestly, why?"

fields.Title: Variable["plaza.rene_fascha_regret_rc"]
Variable["plaza.rene_fascha_regret_rc"]
!(Variable["plaza.rene_fascha_regret_rc"])
Pain Threshold: "You know the answer, don't think --..."
fields.Dialogue Text: You know the answer, don't think -- just say it!

fields.Title: Conceptualization: "Like the last rays of the evening s..."
fields.Dialogue Text: Like the last rays of the evening sun gently kissing the day goodbye, before giving way to unfathomable darkness.

fields.Title: René Arnoux: ""Oh save it." He waves you off. "Me..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "Oh save it." He waves you off. "Men don't have substance anymore, I know that, but seeing such spinelessness in a man bearing an insignia..."

fields.Title: Pain Threshold: "Even worse, a love aborted and smot..."
fields.Dialogue Text: Even worse, a love aborted and smothered, stamped beneath his brilliant boot heel.

fields.Title: Gaston Martin: ""Easy, René, take it easy." There's..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "Easy, René, take it easy." There's genuine concern in his face. "You're right, absolutely right. What was, *was* and that's it. Isn't that right, officer?"

fields.Title: Empathy: "Honour walks and virtue follows. Yo..."
fields.Dialogue Text: Honour walks and virtue follows. You are truly a Detective-Saint, for you refuse to veer even when *no one* is looking. Bravo!

fields.Title: René Arnoux: ""*Imbécile, un putain d'imbécile*....."
fields.Dialogue Text: "*Imbécile, un putain d'imbécile*..." The old veteran clutches his chest and tries to steady his breathing.

fields.Title: Gaston Martin: ""You must forgive mean old René, of..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "You must forgive mean old René, officer!" The other one jumps in. "He can't stop being himself more than a scorpion can stop being a sco..."

fields.Title: Untitled hub (06)
You: ""Right, right... A forensic techniq..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "Right, right... A forensic technique. Can you help me or not?"

fields.Title: Jump to: [RENE MAIN HUB]
You: ""Love. It's about love.""
fields.Dialogue Text: "Love. It's about love."

fields.Title: René Arnoux: ""I can't help you officer," he says..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "I can't help you officer," he says coldly. "There are no second chances in life. We don't deserve them. This is the world we shaped -- a reflection of what we are. Wasted, ugly, and numb."

fields.Title: Gaston Martin: ""Officer, you must forgive Old René..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "Officer, you must forgive Old René. Holding a conversation has always been... problematic with him." He flashes you a quick smile. "Try asking him something else."

fields.Title: René Arnoux: ""*Imbécile, un putain d'imbécile!*...."
fields.Dialogue Text: "*Imbécile, un putain d'imbécile!*..." The old veteran clutches his chest and tries to steady his breathing.

fields.Title: Gaston Martin: ""No, officer." He shakes his head m..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "No, officer." He shakes his head meekly. "We can't help you with that, maybe there's something else we *can* help you with?"

fields.Title: René Arnoux: ""But as soon as the talk turns real..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "But as soon as the talk turns real and there's a smallest amount of friction you're suddenly 'not gonna say anything'. Better to be wrong than a goddamn coward!"

fields.Title: Reaction Speed: "'Here we go again.'"
fields.Dialogue Text: 'Here we go again.'

fields.Title: You: "Ex-love, ex-tenderness..."
fields.Dialogue Text: Ex-love, ex-tenderness...

fields.Title: Empathy: "There's something *substantial* mov..."
fields.Dialogue Text: There's something *substantial* moving in him, trying to get out.

fields.Title: Empathy: "Regret."
fields.Dialogue Text: Regret.

fields.Title: Endurance: "The carabineer is too old and feebl..."
fields.Dialogue Text: The carabineer is too old and feeble to be useful. But you will carry on. *Movere tempore*, kingsman. For the tenacious no road is impassable.

fields.Title: IsKimHere()
IsKimHere()
!(IsKimHere())
Composure: "His posture tenses."
fields.Dialogue Text: His posture tenses.

fields.Title: Gaston Martin: ""Now, now..." His partner raises bo..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "Now, now..." His partner raises both hands in a calming gesture. "I'm sure the officer means it figuratively. Like a forensic technique or something, right?"

fields.Title: Reaction Speed: "Was that a smile on his wrinkled......"
fields.Dialogue Text: Was that a smile on his wrinkled... nevermind, it's gone.

fields.Title: Kim Kitsuragi: "The lieutenant rubs his forehead an..."
fields.Dialogue Text: The lieutenant rubs his forehead and mumbles something under his breath.

fields.Title: Jump to: [René Arnoux: ""Anything else you want or can we g..."]
René Arnoux: "The old carabineer looks at you wit..."
fields.Dialogue Text: The old carabineer looks at you with wary expectation.

fields.Title: Kim Kitsuragi: "The lieutenant flashes you a quick..."
fields.Dialogue Text: The lieutenant flashes you a quick side-glance.

fields.Title: Untitled hub (03)
Rhetoric: "Keep the war-crime jokes coming and..."
fields.Dialogue Text: Keep the war-crime jokes coming and you'll end up on his good side.

fields.Title: René Arnoux: ""Exactly what history needs." He sp..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "Exactly what history needs." He spits on the ground between the two of you. "More drifters, confused wanderers, weightless men..."

fields.Title: You: ""Such a downer, I'm not even sure h..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "Such a downer, I'm not even sure how to respond..."

fields.Title: Endurance: "Don't worry, he doesn't know anythi..."
fields.Dialogue Text: Don't worry, he doesn't know anything useful, the man's almost expired. No fire in him. But *you* will carry on the flame. *Semper fidelis*, kingsman, anything is possible.

fields.Title: René Arnoux: ""Our lives are unique, and I have n..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "Our lives are unique, and I have neither the means nor the will to help you change that." A polite nod. "But I will gladly assist you with police matters."

fields.Title: You: ""Dad?!""
fields.Dialogue Text: "Dad?!"

fields.Title: Pain Threshold: "No, not that one."
fields.Dialogue Text: No, not that one.

fields.Title: René Arnoux: ""Wh...? Oh, I see." He takes a step..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "Wh...? Oh, I see." He takes a step back and nods, jaw clenched tight. "You're a comedian after all. Funny guy. *Unpredictable*."

fields.Title: You: ""Forget it. Let's move on." (Drop i..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "Forget it. Let's move on." (Drop it.)

fields.Title: René Arnoux: ""But it's never *only* about love,..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "But it's never *only* about love, so what else, officer?"

fields.Title: You: ""I just want a second chance. Gonna..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "I just want a second chance. Gonna do it right this time."

fields.Title: You: ""Sure, why not?""
fields.Dialogue Text: "Sure, why not?"

fields.Title: Composure: "A true master of his emotions."
fields.Dialogue Text: A true master of his emotions.

fields.Title: Inland Empire: "Hopelessly alone behind the unbreak..."
fields.Dialogue Text: Hopelessly alone behind the unbreakable walls he spent a lifetime erecting. No one will ever know him.

fields.Title: You: ""Who?""
fields.Dialogue Text: "Who?"

fields.Title: Variable["whirling.exlove_extenderness"]
Variable["whirling.exlove_extenderness"]
!(Variable["whirling.exlove_extenderness"])
